backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature reports mapping implemented features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists high-level summaries for all major frontend YouTube-related components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React UI for inputting a YouTube URL/ID, validating it, and displaying the embedded player with controls.
frontend/src/features/youtube/parseYouTu: Parses and validates YouTube URLs or raw IDs to extract a valid video ID.
frontend/src/features/youtube/PlaybackCo: UI component providing playback, seek, volume, and speed controls for the YouTube player.
frontend/src/features/youtube/useYouTube: React hook managing the YouTube IFrame API player instance and exposing playback control functions and state.
frontend/src/features/youtube/YouTubeEmb: Embeds the YouTube iframe player and connects it to custom playback controls via the player hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, color bindings to CSS variables, plugins, and dark mode behavior.
project_state.json: Holds metadata about project state, features, requirements, and planning notes for the YouTube embed app.
